thoughts.title: Editable Segments
thoughts.description: Allow users to click and edit individual segments in a modal.

segments.title: Editable Segments
segments.content: Allow users to click and edit individual segments in a modal.

thoughts.title: Segment Type Field Parsing
thoughts.description: Allow parsing of field types such as text, location, date, numeric for better filtering.

segments.title: Segment Type Field Parsing
segments.content: Allow parsing of field types such as text, location, date, numeric for better filtering.

thoughts.title: Color Tag Picker
thoughts.description: Add ability to select a color per bubble or per segment.

segments.title: Color Tag Picker
segments.content: Add ability to select a color per bubble or per segment.

thoughts.title: Delete/Edit Thought Bubble
thoughts.description: UI button logic to delete or rename a thought bubble.

segments.title: Delete/Edit Thought Bubble
segments.content: UI button logic to delete or rename a thought bubble.

thoughts.title: Sort and Collapse Segments
thoughts.description: Enable sorting and collapsibility for bubbles with many segments.

segments.title: Sort and Collapse Segments
segments.content: Enable sorting and collapsibility for bubbles with many segments.

thoughts.title: Auto-Save State
thoughts.description: Ensure session persistence using localStorage or IndexedDB.

segments.title: Auto-Save State
segments.content: Ensure session persistence using localStorage or IndexedDB.

thoughts.title: AI Assistant Integration
thoughts.description: Optional toggle to call AI to suggest fields, auto-tag thoughts, and summarize content.

segments.title: AI Assistant Integration
segments.content: Optional toggle to call AI to suggest fields, auto-tag thoughts, and summarize content.

thoughts.title: Create Thought Bubble Generator Script
thoughts.description: Build a standalone script to generate thoughtweb JSON from code inputs.

segments.title: Create Thought Bubble Generator Script
segments.content: Build a standalone script to generate thoughtweb JSON from code inputs.

thoughts.title: Implement ULID into Generator Script
thoughts.description: Integrate ULID library into the thought bubble generator script for lexicographically sortable IDs.

segments.title: Implement ULID into Generator Script
segments.content: Integrate ULID library into the thought bubble generator script for lexicographically sortable IDs.

description: ThoughtWeb Planning Roadmap v0.5: A structured JSON file listing upcoming features for import into ThoughtWeb. Each thought bubble includes metadata to drive visualization, filtering, and AI-assisted enhancements.
